iati-activity.title: University of Edinburgh:eLiCE: e-learning in clinical education
iati-activity.description: The aim is to raise the standard of clinical education in Malawi by further developing e-learning resources and raising the capacity and skills of educators and institutions in Malawi to use e-learning. The project builds on an earlier grant which developed the use of e-learning by sharing and building electronic teaching resources and IT systems. The activities outlined within this new project include: developing and providing electronic teaching and learning resources; the development of postgraduate curricula for particular clinical specialties; and staff development for surgical trainees through an online MSc programme. This online programme will be delivered in conjunction with the Royal College of Physicians from Edinburgh. The project will also undertake an assessment of how the e-learning approach could be used to enhance education provision for nurses and clinical officers, as key groups of health professionals within Malawi, as well as options for enhancing postgraduate training and continuing professional development for health professionals.
